caption.paragraph: Figure 20. Dolichogenidea cacoeciae . A Habitus, lateral B Head, frontal C Wings D Mesosoma and metasoma (partially), dorsal E Metasoma, dorsal F Head and mesosoma, dorsal G Ovipositor sheaths.
